Sweet Songs of Old
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £2.10s. March contest - 1st Cwmtawe, 2nd Trebanos. 3 bands competed.
June 21, 2013, 8:55 a.m. Aug. 17, 2018, 9:37 a.m.
